name: Lamplighter [Prototype]
description:
You're starting a new job, lighting lamps in the Big Boss's dungeon! He says he has guests coming soon and they need to be able to find their way.

Your coworkers seem... nice? Okay, maybe not, but Boss says you are not to damage anything, living or unliving--you'll have to find a way to make due. Use your lantern, your wits, and your limited fuel supply to blaze a path through the dark.

Lamplighter is still in the prototype phase, so if you're enjoying the game--or if you run into any issues--let me know below or on Twitter.

NOTE: Several players have noted the audio comes in pretty loud. Be advised. I will patch it to a lower volume soon (and probably add some sliders, too).

Controls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMoveArrow keys
Left stick, D-padSelect, Interact
Space/EnterButton 1 (A/Cross/B)
